name: A Little Help Here!
text: When Revealed: Exhaust your identity and remove this card from the game. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation. “What the hell?”

name: Battle of the Hulks
text: “My old Pal...”—Ross When Revealed: choose: either place 2 threat on the main scheme, or exhaust your identity. [amplify]

name: Hulk
text: Steady. Guard. Retaliate 1. (Red Hulk's nemesis minion.)

name: Hulk is Back
text: When Revealed: Find Hulk and put it into play engaged with Red Hulk. If you cannot, this card gains surge.

name: Gamma Radiation
text: Incite 1. Surge. When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from any gamma character. Does it still qualify as first aid?
